thread.title: Super Bowl 51: Twitter roasts Tom Brady's whiffed tackle on pick-six

author: Joe Rivera (Joseph.Rivera@performgroup.com)
title: Super Bowl 51: Twitter roasts Tom Brady's whiffed tackle on pick-six
text: â Emily Kuhn (@emkuhnya) February 6, 2017 Beautiful tackle from superstar athlete Tom Brady pic.twitter.com/MXd5IQcyBT â Matt Gambardella (@MGambardella13) February 6, 2017 This halftime show is worse than Tom Brady trying to make a tackle #SuperBowl #PepsiHalfTime â Zack (@ultimatepro13) February 6, 2017 Her dive was better than Tom Brady's tackle attempt. â Kyle (@Kyledoesmath) February 6, 2017 My mans Tom Brady running like he got on shackles & work boots and swear he was about to tackle ya boy.đđđ https://t.co/QJXVIugHUX â MrKnowItAll (@kid___casanova) February 6, 2017 When Tom Brady tried to tackle đ pic.twitter.com/mH8BH2e7XS â Miguel (@MiguelZempel) February 6, 2017 @EAMaddenNFL How about Tom Brady's Tackle rating goes to 0? pic.twitter.com/AmvqoVro4n â SteelCityStrong (@apittsburghdude) February 6, 2017 please enjoy Tom Brady diving and missing the tackle on the pick 6 pic.twitter.com/S0KgWgCDs6 â Alex (@jkindy2) February 6, 2017 Tom Brady doing his best @EASPORTSFIFA fish celebration on that missed tackle. #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/vHQYZSMdb9
